name: Creds
description: $CREDS are the utility token of the DystoPunks metaverse, called Dystoverse. DystoPunks is a utility-focused Cyberpunk-themed NFT project that allows holders to generate a utility token called $CREDS, mint Dystolab Crates and use it in the Dystoverse. To mint a Dystolab Crate you need to go to DystoPunks.net holding a DystoPunk in your wallet and burn 300 $CREDS.
